How to Cite the GATE User Guide

If you have made use of the GATE User Guide and want to cite it in a publication, please use the following reference:

  • Cunningham, et al. Developing Language Processing Components with GATE Version 8. University of Sheffield Department of Computer Science. 17 November 2014.

For details of other related publications, see http://gate.ac.uk/gate/doc/papers.html.
